```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
data(Marriage, package = "mosaicData")
data("Marriage")
```




#Luis
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(ggthemes)
plot <- ggplot(Marriage, aes(x = race, y = college, color = person)) + geom_boxplot()
#filtering to get keep black and white races
race_data <- filter(Marriage, race == c("White","Black"))

#simple box plot
race_plot <- ggplot(race_data, aes(x = race, y = college, color = person)) + geom_boxplot()
#simple bar graph
race_bar <- ggplot(race_data, aes(x = college)) + geom_bar(stat= "identity",aes(y = race, color = race))
#adding facet_wrap by race
race_bar_facet <- race_bar + facet_wrap(~race)
race_bar_facet <- race_bar_facet + xlab("Years of College") + ylab("Count of People")
#race_count
race_bar_facet <- race_bar_facet + theme_economist() 
race_bar_facet + ggtitle("Years of College When Eloping") + theme(legend.position = "right")
```
